llm_calls.response:
Dear Dr. Jenna Green,

RE: Case Status Update - Case #CASE-0023-564140

I am writing to provide you with a current status update on your criminal case. Here are the key details of your case:

Case Type: Criminal
Opposing Party: Savannah Miller
Number of Witnesses: 3 witnesses have been identified for this case

We are actively managing your case and maintaining all appropriate documentation. Our team will continue to keep you informed of any significant developments as they occur.

If you have any questions or need additional information about your case, please don't hesitate to contact our office.

Best regards,
Legal Team

Note: This is a confidential communication between attorney and client. Please keep this information private and secure.
